dcterms:creator: Inc. ANSYS
dcterms:description: A computational fluid dynamics environment used for simulating fluid flow and heat transfer, particularly in the context of thermal control systems.
dcterms:title: Computational Fluid Dynamics (CFD) environment

dcterms:creator: Ronald S Bunker
Jason E Dees
Pepe Palafox
dcterms:description: A dataset detailing the design, applications, and limitations of impingement cooling in gas turbines, providing insights into thermal management strategies.
dcterms:title: Impinging Jet Cooling in Gas Turbines

dcterms:creator: Ji-Xiang Wang
Wei Guo
Kai Xiong
Sheng-Nan Wang
dcterms:description: A comprehensive review of spray cooling technology oriented towards aerospace applications, discussing various techniques and their effectiveness.
dcterms:title: Review of aerospace-oriented spray cooling technology

dcterms:creator: Mrutyunjay Jena
Purna Chandra Mishra
Sudhansu Sekhar Sahoo
dcterms:description: Experimental results comparing the performance of jet and spray impingement cooling methods in a steel strip run-out table, providing insights into their effectiveness.
dcterms:title: Comparative performance of jet and spray impingement cooling

dcterms:creator: Feng Ren
Jean Rabault
Hui Tang
dcterms:description: A dataset exploring the application of deep reinforcement learning for active flow control in weakly turbulent conditions, showcasing its potential in fluid dynamics.
dcterms:title: Active flow control in weakly turbulent conditions

dcterms:creator: Satoshi Shimomura
Satoshi Sekimoto
Akira Oyama
Kozo Fujii
Hiroyuki Nishida
dcterms:description: An experimental study on the application of distributed deep reinforcement learning for closed-loop flow separation control over an airfoil, demonstrating its effectiveness in fluid dynamics.
dcterms:title: Experimental study on application of distributed deep reinforcement learning
